1049980.name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2 - Covert Strike
1049980.description:
A intense new Campaign set after the events of Beyond Enemy Lines 2. The russian mafia were involved in the theft of advanced technological research from a US facility and you need to bring it back!

"Intelligence indicates that the Russian mafia were involved in the theft of advanced technological research from a US facility. They’ve set up a lab under the cover of an old weather station high up in the Carpathians."

Features

  • New Story Campaign with 3 Missions
  • New Graphic Set - Winter
  • 1 New Multiplayer Map (CQ_WeatherStation)*

*Multiplayer content is delivered in a Patch free to every owner of Beyond Enemy Lines 2. By purchasing this DLC you get the Singleplayer Mission.
1049980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
